roleset.name: to make free from live bacteria, to make inoffensive

example.name: transitive
example.text: The Fed has been intervening in foreign currency markets , all right , but through August , at least , it-1 appeared [*-1] to be `` sterilizing '' the intervention .

roleset.note: Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'sterilize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
